MetaData.Description: Default conformance context for eDOS implementation guide.

Predicate.Description: If CWE.2 is not valued
If CWE.1 is not valued
If CWE.1 is valued
If CWE.3 (Name Of Coding System) is valued.
If CWE.6 (Name Of Alternate Coding System) is valued.

If CWE_CRE.1 (Identifier) is valued.
If CWE_CRE.1 (Identifier) is valued.
If CWE_CRE.4 (Alternate Identifier) is valued.
If CWE_CRE.4 (Alternate Identifier) is valued.
If CWE_CRE.3 (Name Of Coding System) is valued.
If CWE_CRE.6 (Name Of Alternate Coding System) is valued.
If CWE_CRE.1 (Identifier) and CWE.4_CRE (alternate identifier) are not valued.
If CWE_RC1.4 (Alternate Identifier) is valued.
If CWE_RC1.6 (Name Of Coding System) is valued.
If CWE_CR.4 (Alternate Identifier) is valued.
If CWE_CR.6 (Name Of Alternate Coding System) is valued.
If HD_NG.2 (Universal ID) is not valued.
If HD_NG.1 (Namespace ID) is not valued.
If HD_NG.2 (Universal ID) is valued.
If OM1-9 (Preferred Report Name for the Observation) and OM1-11 (Preferred Long name for the observation are not valued.
If OM1-9 (Preferred Report Name for the Observation) and OM1-10 (Preferred Short Name or Mnemonic for Observation) are not valued.
If MCP-3 is valued.
Required if OMC-3 is valued.
Required if OMC-2 is valued.
If MSA-1 (Message Acknowledgement) is not valued AA or CA.
If MFI-6 Response Level Code is any value other than 'NE'.
If MFI-6 Response Level Code is any value other than 'NE'.
If MFI-6 Response Level Code is any value other than 'NE'.
If MFI-6 Response Level Code is any value other than 'NE'.
If MFE-1 = 'MDC'
If MFE-1 = 'MDC'

Constraint.Description: EI_GU.3 (Universal ID) SHALL be valued with an ISO-compliant OID.
EI_GU.4 (Universal ID Type) SHALL contain the value 'ISO'.
HD_GU.2 (Universal ID) SHALL be valued with an ISO-compliant OID.
HD_GU.3 (Universal ID Type) SHALL contain the value 'ISO'.
MO.2 (Denomination) SHALL be valued 'USD' drawn from the code system "HL70913"
VID.1 (Version Identifier) SHALL be valued with '2.5.1' drawn from HL7 Table HL70104 .
TS_1 SHALL be precise to the second.
MSH-1 (Field Separator) SHALL contain the constant value '|'.
MSH-2 (Encoding Characters) SHALL contain the constant value '^~\&' or the constant value '^~\&#'.
MFI-6 (Response Level Code) SHALL be valued 'NE' drawn from HL7 Table HL70179.
MFE-5 (Primary Key Value Type) SHALL be valued 'CWE' drawn from HL7 Table HL70355.
If OM4-16 (Specimen Preference) is valued 'P' then OM4-17 (Preferred Specimen/Attribute Sequence ID) SHALL NOT be valued.
If OM4-16 (Specimen Preference) is valued 'A' then OM4-17 (Preferred Specimen/Attribute Sequence ID) SHALL be valued.
NTE-1 (Set ID - NTE) SHALL be sequentially numbered starting with the value '1' for each segment it is following.
CDM-7.3 (Procedure Code.Code system) SHALL be valued 'C4' drawn from the HL7 table 0088.

An occurrence of MSH-21 (Message Profile Identifier) SHALL be valued with '2.16.840.1.113883.9.70' (eDOS_GU_PROFILE) or two occurrences SHALL be valued with '2.16.840.1.113883.9.67' (eDOS_COMMON_COMPONENT) and '2.16.840.1.113883.9.68' (eDOS_GU_COMPONENT) in any order.
MSH-9.1 (Message Code) SHALL be valued 'MFN' drawn from the HL7 Table HL70076
MSH-9.2 (Trigger Event) SHALL be valued 'M04' drawn from the HL7 Table HL70003.
MSH-9.3 (Message Structure) SHALL be valued 'MFN_M04' drawn from HL7 Table HL70354.
MFI-1.1 (Identifier) SHALL be valued 'CDM' drawn from the HL7 Table HL70175.

An occurrence of MSH-21 (Message Profile Identifier) SHALL be valued with '2.16.840.1.113883.9.71' (eDOS_NG_PROFILE) or two occurrences SHALL be valued with '2.16.840.1.113883.9.67' (eDOS_COMMON_COMPONENT) and '2.16.840.1.113883.9.69' (eDOS_NG_COMPONENT) in any order.

MSH-9.2 (Trigger Event) SHALL be valued 'M18' drawn from the HL7 Table HL70003.
MSH-9.3 (Message Structure) SHALL be valued 'MFK_M01' drawn from the HL7 Table HL70354.

An occurrence of MSH-21 (Message Profile Identifier) SHALL be valued with '2.16.840.1.113883.9.76' (eDOS_NG_RESPONSE_PROFILE) or two occurrences SHALL be valued with '2.16.840.1.113883.9.72' (eDOS_ACKNOWLEDGEMENT_COMPONENT) and '2.16.840.1.113883.9.74' (eDOS_NG_ACKNOWLEDGEMENT_COMPONENT) in any order.
MSH-9.1 (Message Code) SHALL be valued 'MFK' drawn from the HL7 Table HL70076.
MSH-9.2 (Trigger Event) SHALL be valued 'M18' drawn from the HL7 Table HL70003.
MSH-9.3 (Message Structure) SHALL be valued 'MFK_M01' drawn from the HL7 Table HL70354.
MFI-1.1 (Identifier) SHALL be valued 'MLCP' or 'MACP' drawn from the HL7 Table HL70175.
OM1-2 (Producer's Service/Test/Observation ID) SHALL match MFE-4 (Primary Key Value - MFE).
If MSH-9.2 (Message Type^Trigger Event) is valued 'M08' then OM1-18 (Nature of Service/Test/Observation) SHALL be valued 'A' or 'C'.
OM1-1 (Sequence Number - Test/Observation Master File) SHALL be valued sequentially starting with the value '1' within the message.
OM2-1 (Sequence Number - Test/Observation Master File) SHALL contain the same value as the sequence number of the associated OM1 segment.
OM3-1 (Sequence Number - Test/Observation Master File) SHALL contain the same value as the sequence number of the associated OM1 segment.

The first part of OM4-1 (Sequence Number - Test/Observation Master File) SHALL contain the same value as the sequence number of the associated OM1 segment. The second part of OM4-1 (Sequence Number - Test/Observation Master File) SHALL be valued sequentially.
OM1-2 (Producer's Service/Test/Observation ID) SHALL match MFE-4 (Primary Key Value - MFE).
If MSH-9.2 (Message Type^Trigger Event) is valued 'M10' then OM1-18 (Nature of Service/Test/Observation) SHALL be valued 'F', 'S', or 'P'.
OM1-1 (Sequence Number - Test/Observation Master File) SHALL be valued sequentially starting with the value '1' within the message.
OM5-1 (Sequence Number - Test/Observation Master File) SHALL contain the same value as the sequence number of the associated OM1 segment.
CDM-1 (Primary Key Value - CDM) SHALL match MFE-4 (Primary Key Value - MFE).
MCP-2 (Producer's Service/Test/Observation ID) SHALL match MFE-4 (Primary Key Value - MFE).
MCP-1 (Set ID - MCP) SHALL be sequentially numbered starting with the value '1' within a given PAYER MF Entry group.
